\Aura

\AuraInput

Namespaces

Exception

Interfaces

AntiCsrfInterface Defines the interface for anti-CSRF protection logic.
BuilderInterface The interface for a builder to create fields, fieldsets, and fieldset collections.
FilterInterface A filter interface

Classes

AbstractInput An abstract input class; serves as the base for Fields, Fieldsets, and Collections.
Builder A builder to create Field, Fieldset, and fieldset Collection objects.
Collection Represents a collection of fieldsets of a single type.
CollectionIterator An object to allow iteration over fieldsets.
Exception Generic package exception.
Field A single field in a fieldset.
Fieldset A fieldset of inputs, where the inputs themselves may be values, other fieldsets, or other collections.
Filter A filter
Form A top-level form object to contain fields, fieldsets, collections, and anti-CSRF protection.
